Body: I might be wrong since I'm unable to find any sources supporting this, but it's increasingly my gut feeling that linguistics appears to focus on spoken languages as opposed to written ones. If this is the case, why is it?
Title: Why does linguistics focus on spoken languages rather than written ones?
